title: conferred on them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 
(Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development Plan Delivery and 
Reform) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister public expenditure national development plan delivery reform) order 2023

title: conferred on them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act
heading: 2. Deborah Sweeney, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
2. Deborah Sweeney, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of Public Expenditure, National Development 
Plan Delivery and Reform, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister 
for Public Expenditure, National Development Plan Delivery and Reform with 
effect from 17 December 2022.
text_norm: 2 deborah sweeney particular whose address deposited office department public expenditure national development plan delivery reform appointed special adviser minister public expenditure national development plan delivery reform effect 17 december 2022

title: conferred on them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act
heading: 3. Fiona O’Connor, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
3. Fiona O’Connor, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of Public Expenditure, National Development 
Plan Delivery and Reform, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister 
for Public Expenditure, National Development Plan Delivery and Reform with 
effect from 17 December 2022. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal 
of the Government, 
28 March, 2023. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 31st March, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [244] 3
